mapper.insert: insert into seckill_activity (id, goods_id, seckill_price, stock_count, start_date, end_date, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seckillPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update seckill_activity
goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
seckill_price = #{seckillPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
stock_count = #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
